question: Which of the following statements are true regarding VPC peering?

answers.A: It is a way to connect two different VPCs within the same region and same account
answers.B: Once VPC2 owner accepts the peering request, connection between the two VPCs can be established
answers.C: For enabling traffic between the two VPCs, both the VPCs need to add a router entry in their respective route tables
answers.D: To Enable traffic from the peering VPCs, updating the security groups of each VPC might be required
answers.E: In a VPC peering connection, network traffic will flow through a separate VPC resources such as gateway or VPN connections
answers.F: It is a way to connect two different VPCs within the same region irrespective of whether they belong to the same AWS account or a different AWS account
